name: World Defender (vicariouss)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project. 

Modifications: 

  1. Created 3 different levels with different tasks such as: destroy a lot of enemies, destroy the base, kill the boss. 
  2. Added custom music to the menu.
  3. Added a new type of enemy - Boss. Changed the characteristics and colors of different mobs for each level. 
  4. Added (second level) objects that can be destroyed.
  5. Changed the visual component of the menu and each level.

Created by Viktoriia
